    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Consolidated
Statements of Stockholders&#8217; Equity&#160;&#160;22</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Notes to
Consolidated Financial Statements&#160;&#160;23</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Balance
Sheets&#160;&#160;26</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Statements
of Income&#160;&#160;27</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Statements
of Changes in Stockholders&#8217; Equity&#160;&#160;28</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Notes to
Non-Consolidated Financial Statements&#160;&#160;30</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Copy of
Independent Auditor&#8217;s Audit Report (Consolidated)&#160;&#160;34</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Copy of
Independent Auditor&#8217;s Audit Report&#160;&#160;35</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Copy of
Board of Corporate Auditors&#8217; Audit Report&#160;&#160;&#160;36</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(Reference)&#160;&#160;Memorandum
to Shareholders&#160;&#160;38</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Message to
Shareholders</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">To Our
Shareholders</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We are
pleased to send you our &#8220;Report for the 67th Fiscal Year (from April 1, 2008 to
March 31, 2009).&#8221;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In the
semiconductor-related market, excess inventory and price pressures persisted
since the previous fiscal year and the anticipated demand during this fiscal
year for desktop high performance PC replacements, as well as demand for home
electronics ahead of the Beijing Olympics, fell short of
expectations.&#160;&#160;Furthermore, ripple effects of the financial crisis in
the U.S. spread to Europe and to emerging markets in Southeast Asia and
elsewhere, which had previously been stable.&#160;&#160;These factors reinforced
the defensive stance of semiconductor manufacturers, many of whom implemented
production cuts and froze or postponed their capital expenditure
programs.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In
response to these dramatic changes in the environment, Advantest actively cut
costs throughout the fiscal year, and implemented emergency measures in November
2008, which included reduction of fixed costs such as reduction of the workforce
and reduced compensation for directors, corporate auditors, executive officers
and managers.&#160;&#160;However, the business climate continued to deteriorate
once entering 2009 and Advantest responded with follow-on measures by reviewing
underperforming product lines, aiming for further workforce optimization through
acceptance of voluntary retirement from full-time employees and other measures
as its planned structural reforms.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">However,
orders input received and net sales declined steeply compared to the previous
fiscal year.&#160;&#160;Accordingly, orders input received decreased by 69.1%
from the previous fiscal year to &#165;50.1 billion, net sales decreased by 58.1%
from the previous fiscal year to &#165;76.7 billion, operating loss was &#165;49.5
billion, loss before income taxes and equity in loss of affiliated company was
&#165;52.8 billion, and net loss was &#165;74.9 billion.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Despite
economic and employment stimulus packages recently announced by many countries
to counter the global economic slowdown, the timing of the recovery remains
uncertain and visibility is still limited.&#160;&#160;In the
semiconductor-related market, trends in demand for end-user products including
automobiles, mobile phones, and consumer electronics remain uncertain and the
possibility of significant changes still lies ahead with restructuring underway
in the semiconductor industry.&#160;&#160;Thus, Advantest refrains from making
any predictions on the timing of the recovery of capital
expenditures.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In this
operating environment, in addition to the measures already implemented,
Advantest will focus on deriving efficiency gains in its research and
development and manufacturing processes by consolidating subsidiaries, reducing
fixed costs through consolidation and closing of business offices and other
facilities, improving productivity of in-house processes, and reinforcing the
Advantest Group&#8217;s sales structure.&#160;&#160;Furthermore, Advantest will
implement measures to enable it to take full advantage of the next upturn in the
market, including implementing organizational reform to complement restructuring
undertaken by its customers, reinforcing global service networks and developing
new products and entering into new businesses.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">With
respect to the dividend distribution to the shareholders, Advantest resolved at
the meeting of the Board of Directors held on May 26, 2009 to distribute a year
end dividend of 5 yen per share, with a payment date of June 2,
2009.&#160;&#160;Since Advantest has paid an interim dividend of 25 yen, the
total dividend per share for the fiscal year will be 30 yen per share.
</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We hope
that we may rely on you for your continued support and guidance in the
future.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">June
2009</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Toshio
Maruyama</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Representative
Board Director,</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">President
and CEO</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">3</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(Attachments
to the Convocation Notice of the 67th Ordinary General Meeting of
Shareholders)</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Business
Report</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="center">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(April 1,
2008 through March 31, 2009)</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Current
Conditions of the Advantest Group</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(1)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Business
conditions during the fiscal year</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)&#160;&#160;Operations
and Results of Business</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Overall</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In the
fiscal year ended March 31, 2009, the global economy saw a continued
deceleration during the first half of the fiscal year due to the expansion of
the sub-prime loan crisis in the U.S., and the Lehman shock in September 2008
further aggravated the financial crisis and accelerated the rapid deterioration
of the global economy.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In the
semiconductor-related market, although excess inventory and price pressures
persisted since the previous fiscal year, many hoped at the beginning of this
fiscal year that desktop high performance PC replacements, as well as demand for
home electronics ahead of the Beijing Olympics, would drive an upturn in the
market. However, growth in demand fell short of expectations, and semiconductor
manufacturers continued to take a cautious stance on capital expenditures,
prolonging Advantest&#8217;s extremely difficult business environment.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Furthermore,
ripple effects of the financial crisis in the U.S. spread to Europe and to
emerging markets in Southeast Asia and elsewhere, which had previously been
stable. Decreasing demand for end-user products reinforced the defensive stance
of semiconductor manufacturers, many of whom implemented production cuts and
froze or postponed their capital expenditure programs starting from the second
half of the fiscal year.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In
response to these dramatic changes in the environment, Advantest actively cut
costs throughout the fiscal year, and also implemented emergency measures to
improve profitability in November 2008. These measures included reduction of
fixed costs such as, reduction of the workforce, and reduced compensation for
directors, corporate auditors, executive officers and managers. However, the
business climate continued to deteriorate in 2009 and Advantest responded with
further measures by reviewing underperforming product lines, acceptance of
voluntary retirement from full-time employees and among others, aiming for
further workforce optimization as its planned structural reforms.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">However,
orders input received and net sales declined steeply compared to the previous
fiscal year, causing Advantest to recognize inventory valuation losses of &#165;8.7
billion, restructuring costs of &#165;5.1 billion, impairment loss on property,
plant, and equipment of &#165;13.8 billion and a valuation allowance on deferred tax
assets of &#165;45.1 billion.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Accordingly,
orders input received decreased by 69.1% from the previous fiscal year to &#165;50.1
billion, net sales decreased by 58.1% from the previous fiscal year to &#165;76.7
billion, operating loss was &#165;49.5 billion, loss before income taxes and equity
in loss of affiliated company was &#165;52.8 billion, and net loss was &#165;74.9
billion.&#160;&#160;Furthermore, Advantest&#8217;s overseas sales ratio fell to 67.7%,
compared to 69.3% in the previous fiscal year.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Business
conditions by Business Segment</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Semiconductor
and Component Test System Segment</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In the
Semiconductor and Component Test Systems segment, the semiconductor downturn
combined with global economic fears sharply curbed capital spending by major
manufacturers.&#160;&#160;Accordingly, Advantest&#8217;s results for both memory and
non-memory test systems remained weak.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In the
memory sector, the delay of the anticipated transition to DDR3-DRAM
semiconductors for high-performance computers, coupled with the continuous
oversupply held down prices of DDR2-DRAM, and semiconductor manufacturers
restrained investment in DRAM test systems.&#160;&#160;Demand for flash memory
semiconductors were also weak caused by oversupply, and in addition, falling
sales of mobile phones placed pressure on prices, causing capital expenditures
in flash memory test systems to remain weak.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In the
non-memory sector, strong sales of notebooks and other mobile PCs were recorded
in the first half of the fiscal year, and signs of increase in production were
seen among the semiconductor manufacturers in related
fields.&#160;&#160;However, the demand associated with the Beijing Olympics fell
short of expectations and a recovery in capital expenditures. Moreover, the
worldwide decline in consumer confidence suppressed demand for products using
semiconductors, leading to a continued weak demand in test systems for consumer,
automotive and LCD driver ICs.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">4</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">As a result of the above, orders input
received in the Semiconductor and Component Test System segment was &#165;26.1
billion, a 77.4% decrease in comparison to the previous fiscal year. Net sales
were &#165;49.2 billion, a 62.6% decrease in comparison to the previous fiscal year,
and operating</font> <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">loss was
&#165;28.9 billion.</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Mechatronics
System Segment</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The low
market demand for memory and non-memory test systems also weakened demand for
test handlers and device interface products, which are used together with test
systems. In particular, the downturn in the DRAM semiconductor market produced a
dramatic decline in demand for back-end test handlers.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">As a
result of the above, orders input received in the Mechatronics System segment
was &#165;9.1 billion (a 69.9% decrease in comparison to the previous fiscal year).
Net sales were &#165;14.4 billion (a 58.8% decrease in comparison to the previous
fiscal year) and operating loss was &#165;11.9 billion.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Services,
Support and Others Segment</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
decline in demand for maintenance services, weak performance in the
semiconductor market, and the decline in demand for maintenance and other
services caused, orders input received in the Services, Support and Others
segment to decline to &#165;15.6 billion (a 19.1% decrease in comparison to the
previous fiscal year). Net sales were &#165;15.8 billion (a 18.2% decrease in
comparison to the previous fiscal year) and operating loss was &#165;1.1
billion.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">5</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">

      </div>
    </div>

Breakdown by Business Segment (consolidated)</font></div>

            </td>
            <td align="right" valign="top" width="15%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 9pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(74,817)</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="right" valign="top" width="14%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 7.65pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(59.0)</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(ii)&#160;&#160;Capital
Expenditures</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
Advantest Group invested a total of &#165;4.6 billion in capital expenditures in
fiscal year 2008.&#160;&#160;Most of the investments were used to fund new
product development, manufacturing streamlining and power saving.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(iii)&#160;&#160;Financing</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">No
significant financing activities took place in fiscal year
2008.</font></div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(Notes)&#160;
      1:</font></div>

      Company prepared its consolidated financial statements in accordance with
      generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP) in the United
      States.</font></div>

              <td style="WIDTH: 97px">
                <div>&#160;</div>
              </td>
              <td style="WIDTH: 24px">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2:</font></div>
              </td>
              <td width="88%">
                <div align="left">
                  <div align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#8220;Basic
      net income per share&#8221; for fiscal year 2005 is calculated on the assumption
      that a one to two stock split on October 1, 2006 was made at the beginning
      of the fiscal year.</font></div>
                </div>
              </td>

            <td style="WIDTH: 24px">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">3:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td width="88%">
              <div align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      calculation of &#8220;Basic net income per share&#8221; was based on the average
      number of shares issued during the relevant fiscal year reduced by the
      average number of treasury shares held during the fiscal
    year.</font></div>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(3)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Significant
Subsidiaries</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div align="left">
      <table cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td valign="middle" width="35%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Name
      of Subsidiary</font></div>
            </td>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(Notes)&#160;1:
Percentage of voting rights includes indirectly held shares.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2:
Advanmechatec Co., Ltd. and Advantest DI Corporation were merged into Advantest
Manufacturing, Inc. on April 1, 2009.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">3:<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font>Advantest (Europe) GmbH
changed its trade name to Advantest Europe GmbH on April 1, 2009.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(4)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Challenges
Ahead</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">While
maintaining &#8220;Measurements&#8221; as our core competence in the mid-to-long-term, the
Advantest Group intends to improve its corporate value by establishing a
management and financial structure that responds timely to changes in the global
market.&#160;&#160;Specifically, the Advantest Group will aim to increase market
share by introducing fine products that will inspire the market demands of the
next generation.&#160;&#160;To achieve these objectives, the Advantest Group
promotes to further strengthen its product development operations, improve
production efficiency, focus on certain businesses, strengthen its overseas
operations and support system in the U.S., Europe and Asia.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Confronting
deepening capital spending cuts by semiconductor manufacturers and the
likelihood of Advantest&#8217;s operating environment remaining weak for a prolonged
period, the Advantest Group has implemented initiatives for structural reforms
to reinforce management structure.&#160;&#160;Such measures include workforce
optimization, the integration of four manufacturing subsidiaries, the likewise
integration of four software subsidiaries, ongoing review of underperforming
business segments, exploration of and investment into new businesses, payroll
cost reductions, and the consolidation and closing of offices and other
facilities.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Through
&#8220;Activate 21,&#8221; a corporate initiative launched in October 2005, the Advantest
Group has pursued greater efficiency, cost savings and financial health from a
global perspective. The initiative concluded in March 2009, with positive
results including productivity improvements from reinforcements made to the
just-in-time (&#8220;JIT&#8221;) production system, inventory optimization, and
standardization of design specifications leading to enhanced development
efficiency. The Advantest Group&#8217;s new corporate initiative, starting from fiscal
year 2009, will incorporate detailed measures and goals to be applied once the
structural reforms that the Advantest Group is currently conducting are
completed.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">8</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(5)&#160;&#160;&#160;
Primary Areas of Business</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
Advantest Group manufactures and markets semiconductor and component test
systems and products related to mechatronics systems (test handlers, device
interface, etc.).&#160;&#160;In addition to manufacturing, the Advantest Group
also carries out research and development activities and provides maintenance
services and related services in the business category of &#8220;Services, Support and
Others.&#8221;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div>

</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Significant
Sales Offices and Factories</font></div>

            <td align="left" valign="top" width="40%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">China</font></div>

      shares).</font></font></font></div>

      units</font></div>

      persons)</font></div>

      person who holds the stock acquisition rights (the &#8220;rights holder&#8221;) may
      not exercise his/her rights if:</font></div>
                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, serif">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;the
      rights holder becomes a person who does not hold any position as a
      director, corporate auditor, executive officer, employee, advisor or
      non-regular employee of the Company or its subsidiaries before the
      expiration of the exercise period, unless the Company otherwise deems it
      appropriate to allow him/her to exercise his/her stock acquisition rights
      and notifies him/her to that effect;</font></div>
                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, serif">(b)&#160;&#160;
      the rights holder dies.</font></div>
                                      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, serif">(2)&#160;&#160;
      The stock acquisition rights may not be inherited.</font></div>
                                    </td>
                                    <td align="left" colspan="3" valign="top" width="19%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      stock acquisition rights may not be
inherited.</font></div>
                                    </td>
                                  </tr>

                                                  <td width="20%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
                                                  <td valign="top" width="20%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      resolution at the Board of Directors held on June 28, 2005</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td width="20%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      resolution at the Board of Directors held on June 27, 2006</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td width="20%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      resolution at the Board of Directors held on June 27, 2007</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td width="20%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      resolution at the Board of Directors held on June 25,
  2008</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td valign="top" width="20%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Reasons
      for the Company&#8217;s acquisition of the stock acquisition
    rights</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td valign="top" width="20%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(a)&#160;&#160;
      The Company may acquire, for no consideration, any stock acquisition right
      in the event that the general meeting of the shareholders resolves to
      approve (i) any merger agreement pursuant to which the Company shall cease
      to exist, or (ii) any share exchange agreement or share transfer pursuant
      to which the Company shall become a wholly owned subsidiary of another
      company.</font></div>
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(b)&#160;&#160;
      The Company may acquire, for no consideration, all or part of the stock
      acquisition rights owned by a rights holder to the extent that such stock
      acquisition rights are not exercisable due to the rights holder&#8217;s failure
      to satisfy any of the conditions to exercise stock acquisition
      rights.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td align="left" colspan="3" valign="top" width="60%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The Company shall
      automatically acquire the stock acquisition rights, for no consideration,
      if: </font>

                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the
      general meeting of shareholders resolves to approve (if approval by the
      shareholders&#8217; meeting is not legally required, then the Board of Directors
      may approve) (i) any merger agreement pursuant to which the Company shall
      dissolve, (ii) any agreement or a plan pursuant to which the Company shall
      split all or part of its business or (iii) any stock-for-stock exchange
      agreement or stock-transfer plan pursuant to which the Company shall
      become a wholly-owned subsidiary of another company;</font></div>
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the
      rights holder becomes a person who does not hold any position as a
      director, corporate auditor, executive officer, employee, advisor or
      non-regular employee of the Company or its subsidiaries before the
      expiration of the exercise period, unless the Company otherwise deems it
      appropriate to allow him/her to exercise his/her stock acquisition rights
      and notifies him/her to that effect;</font></div>
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the
      rights holder dies.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                                <tr>
                                                  <td valign="top" width="20%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Restriction
      on the transfer of the stock acquisition rights</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td colspan="2" valign="top" width="20%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Approval
      by the Board of Directors is required to transfer the stock acquisition
      rights, except where the Company is the transferee with respect to such
      transfer.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                  <td colspan="2" width="20%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
                                                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Acquisition
      of the stock acquisition rights by transfer shall require an approval by
      the Board of Directors.&#160;&#160;Provided, however, if it is the Company
      acquiring the stock acquisition rights by transfer, such transfer shall be
      deemed to be approved by the Board of
Directors.</font></div>
                                                  </td>
                                                </tr>
                                            </table>
                                          </div>
                                        </div>
                                      </div>
                                    </div>
                                  </div>
                                </div>
                              </div>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div>&#160;</div>
    <div>&#160;</div>

                          <div align="left">
                            <div align="left">

      of exercise</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" colspan="2" valign="top" width="67%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; TEXT-INDENT: -27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      stock acquisition rights may not be inherited.</font></div>
            </td>

          <tr>
            <td align="left" colspan="2" valign="top" width="33%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Reasons
      for the Company&#8217;s acquisition of the stock acquisition
    rights</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" colspan="2" valign="top" width="67%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      Company shall automatically acquire the stock acquisition rights, for no
      consideration, if:</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(a)&#160;&#160;
      the general meeting of shareholders resolves to approve (if approval by
      the shareholders&#8217; meeting is not legally required, then the Board of
      Directors may approve) (i) any merger agreement pursuant to which the
      Company shall dissolve, (ii) any agreement or a plan pursuant to which the
      Company shall split all or part of its business or (iii) any
      stock-for-stock exchange agreement or stock-transfer plan pursuant to
      which the Company shall become a wholly-owned subsidiary of another
      company;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(b)&#160;&#160;
      the rights holder becomes a person who does not hold any position as a
      director, corporate auditor, executive officer, employee, advisor or
      non-regular employee of the Company or its subsidiaries before the
      expiration of the exercise period, unless the Company otherwise deems it
      appropriate to allow him/her to exercise his/her stock acquisition rights
      and notifies him/her to that effect;</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(c)&#160;&#160;
      the rights holder dies.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" colspan="2" valign="top" width="33%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Restriction
      on the transfer of the stock acquisition rights</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" colspan="2" valign="top" width="67%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 2px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 2px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Acquisition
      of the stock acquisition rights by transfer shall require an approval by
      the Board of Directors.&#160;&#160;Provided, however, if it is the Company
      acquiring the stock acquisition rights by transfer, such transfer shall be
      deemed to be approved by the Board of
Directors.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">

        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
        </div>
      </div>

and Corporate Auditors</font></div>

            </td>
            <td>
              <div align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Messrs.
      Naoyuki Akikusa and Yasushige Hagio are outside
  directors.</font></div>

      </font></div>
            </td>
            <td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2:</font></div>

      Megumi Yamamuro and Jiro Haneda are outside corporate
      auditors.</font></div>

      </font></div>

            <td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">3:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Mr.
      Hitoshi Owada, standing corporate auditor, has substantial accounting
      experience at the Company and considerable knowledge of financial and
      accounting matters.</font></div>

          <tr valign="top">
            <td style="WIDTH: 54pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
            </td>
            <td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">4:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">There
      has been no significant change in assignment in the Company and
      representatives of other organizations, etc. of directors and corporate
      auditors after March 31, 2009.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">General
      Manager, Nanotechnology 2nd Business
Division</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>

              <td style="WIDTH: 45pt">
                <div>
                  <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(Notes)</font></div>
                </div>
              </td>
              <td style="WIDTH: 45pt">
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">1:</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div align="left">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
      amounts of compensation set forth above include compensation paid in
      relation to stock option rights and fixed compensation paid to two
      directors and one outside corporate auditor who retired from their
      respective positions as of the closing of the 66th ordinary general
      meeting of shareholders, which was held on June 25,
      2008.</font></div>
                </div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
      <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td style="WIDTH: 45pt">
            </td>
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 45pt">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Of
      the amount of compensation set forth above, the aggregate amount of
      compensation for two outside directors and three outside corporate
      auditors is &#165;42 million.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">
      <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td style="WIDTH: 45pt">
            </td>
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 45pt">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">3:</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="left">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">At
      the 64th ordinary general meeting of shareholders held on June 27, 2006,
      the Company resolved to pay cut-off payments in accordance with the
      abolition of the retirement benefits scheme for directors and corporate
      auditors.&#160;&#160;In addition to the amounts of compensation set forth
      above, the Company paid a total of &#165;274 million in retirement benefits to
      two directors and one outside corporate auditor who retired from their
      respective positions during this fiscal year.&#160;&#160;Such payments
      consisted of &#165;273 million to the two directors and &#165;1 million to the
      outside corporate auditor.&#160;&#160;The estimated amount of liability in
      respect of retirement benefits for directors and corporate auditors as of
      the end of this fiscal year is a total of &#165;669 million to be paid to seven
      directors.&#160;&#160;Payment of such benefits shall be made at the time
      that each such director or executive officer retires from his or her
      position.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(iii)</font>
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Matters
pertaining to outside directors and outside corporate
auditors</font></div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

            <td>
              <div align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Concurrent

      <table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" width="100%">
          <tr valign="top">
            <td style="WIDTH: 27pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
      </font></div>
            </td>
            <td style="WIDTH: 27pt">
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(c)</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Overview
      of the liability limitation
agreement</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
Company entered into an agreement limiting liabilities as defined in Article
423, Paragraph 1 of the Company Law, with each of Messrs. Naoyuki Akikusa and
Yasushige Hagio, outside directors, and Messrs. Megumi Yamamuro and Jiro Haneda,
outside corporate auditors.&#160;&#160;The upper limit of liability based on
this agreement is the minimum liability as provided in the relevant laws and
ordinances.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

            <td>
              <div align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Accounting
