              <tr>
                <td align="left" colspan="2" valign="top" width="100%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 1px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 1px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 1px solid">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">We
      have audited the consolidated financial statements of Advantest
      Corporation (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) for its 67th fiscal year (April 1, 2008
      through March 31, 2009), including the consolidated balance sheets,
      consolidated statements of income, consolidated statements of
      stockholders&#8217; equity, and notes to consolidated financial statements, for
      the purpose of reporting under the provisions of Article 444, Paragraph 4
      of the &#8220;Company Law.&#8221;&#160;&#160;The management of the Company was
      responsible for the preparation of these consolidated financial
      statements, and our responsibility shall be limited to the expression of
      an independent opinion regarding the consolidated financial
      statements.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">We
      conducted our audit in accordance with auditing standards generally
      accepted in Japan.&#160;&#160;These auditing standards require reasonable
      assurance that the consolidated financial statements do not contain any
      untrue statements of material fact.&#160;&#160;The audit was conducted
      based on an audit by testing, and included a review of the consolidated
      financial statements as a whole and an evaluation of the accounting
      policies adopted by the management, the application thereof, and the
      estimates prepared by the management.&#160;&#160;We believe that we have
      obtained a reasonable basis to form our opinion as a result of the
      audit.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">In
      our opinion, the consolidated financial statements properly present the
      financial position and the results of operations during the fiscal year,
      in all material respects, of the company group consisting of Advantest
      Corporation and its consolidated subsidiaries in conformity with
      accounting principles generally accepted in the United States of America
      (Please refer to &#8220;Notes to Consolidated Financial Statements,&#8221; &#8220;1. Notes
      to significant matters based on which the Consolidated Financial
      Statements were prepared (1)&#8221;), pursuant to the provisions of Article 120,
      Paragraph 1 of the Company Accounting Regulation.</font></div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">We
      have no specific interest in the Company required to be stated by the
      provisions of the Certified Public Accountant Law.</font></div>
                  </div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 10.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                </td>

      the Board of Directors of Advantest Corporation:</font></div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>

      LLC</font></div>

                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Certified
      Public Accountant</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right">&#160;</div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; TEXT-DECORATION: underline"><font style="DISPLAY: inline">Makoto Usui</font></font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Limited
      Liability Engagement Partner</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Certified
      Public Accountant</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="right">&#160;</div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                      <td valign="top" width="8%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 1px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 1px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt">&#160;</div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt">&#160;</div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt">&#160;</div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt">&#160;</div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt">&#160;</div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt">&#160;</div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt">&#160;</div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt">&#160;</div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt">&#160;</div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt">&#160;</div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 24pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 24pt; FONT-FAMILY: century gothic">&#160;O</font></font></div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&#160;</div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt">&#160;</div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt">&#160;</div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 24pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;<font style="FONT-SIZE: 24pt; FONT-FAMILY: century gothic">O</font></font></div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt">&#160;</div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td align="left" colspan="2" valign="top" width="100%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 1px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 1px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 1px solid">
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt">&#160;</div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt">
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">We
      have audited the financial statements of Advantest Corporation (the
      &#8220;Company&#8221;) for its 67th fiscal year (April 1, 2008 through March 31,
      2009), which included the balance sheets, statements of income, statements
      of changes in stockholders&#8217; equity, notes to non-consolidated financial
      statements, and its supporting schedules, for the purpose of reporting
      under the provisions of Article 436, Paragraph 2, Section 1 of the
      &#8220;Company Law.&#8221;&#160;&#160;The management of the Company was responsible
      for the preparation of these financial statements and its supporting
      schedules, and our responsibility shall be limited to the expression of an
      independent opinion regarding the financial statements and its supporting
      schedules.</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">We
      conducted our audit in accordance with auditing standards generally
      accepted in Japan.&#160;&#160;The auditing standards require reasonable
      assurance that the financial statements and its supporting schedules do
      not contain any untrue statements of material fact.&#160;&#160;The audit
      was conducted based on an audit by testing, and included a review of the
      financial statements and its supporting schedules as a whole and an
      evaluation of the accounting policies adopted by the management, the
      application thereof, and the estimates prepared by the
      management.&#160;&#160;We believe that we have obtained a reasonable basis
      to form our opinion as a result of the audit.</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">In
      our opinion, the above financial statements and its supporting schedules
      properly present the financial position and the results of operations of
      the Company during the fiscal year, in all material respects, in
      conformity with accounting principles generally accepted in
      Japan.</font></div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">We
      have no specific interest in the Company required to be stated by the
      provisions of the Certified Public Accountant Law.</font></div>
                        </div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 10.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&#160;</div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="justify">
        <div align="left">
          <div align="left">&#160;</div>
        </div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&#160;</div>
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&#160;</div>
        <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
          <div id="FTR">
            <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">35</font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            </div>
            <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
              <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div id="HDR">
            <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

    <div>&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Copy of Board of Corporate
Auditors&#8217; Audit Report</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div>
      <div align="left">
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
            <tr>
              <td valign="top" width="100%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 1px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 1px solid; BORDER-LEFT: black 1px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: black 1px solid">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Audit
      Report</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="center">&#160;</div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">This
      Audit Report was prepared by the Board of Corporate Auditors of Advantest
      Corporation (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) after deliberation, based on audit reports
      prepared by each Corporate Auditor with respect to the methods and results
      of audit concerning the performance of each Director of his/her respective
      duties during the 67th fiscal year (April 1, 2008 through March 31,
      2009).&#160;&#160;We hereby report as follows.</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Methods of Audit by Corporate Auditors and the Board of Corporate
      Auditors, and its contents</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">In
      addition to establishing audit policies and audit plans for the fiscal
      year, and receiving reports from each Corporate Auditor on the
      implementation status and results of the audit, the Board of Corporate
      Auditors received reports from Directors and Independent Auditors on the
      performance of their duties and requested further explanations as deemed
      necessary.</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">In
      compliance with the rules of audit of Corporate Auditors established by
      the Board of Corporate Auditors, pursuant to the audit policies and audit
      plans, each Corporate Auditor communicated with Directors, Executive
      Officers as well as other employees such as members of the Audit Office in
      order to collect information, and improve the auditing system, attended
      meetings of the Board of Directors and other important meetings, received
      reports from Directors, Executive Officers and employees on the
      performance of their duties, requested further explanations as deemed
      necessary, reviewed important approval-granting documents, and inspected
      the state of business operations and assets at the head office and other
      important branch offices.</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">In
      addition, we monitored and reviewed the contents of resolutions of the
      meeting of the Board of Directors with respect to the development of a
      system as defined in Article 100, Paragraphs 1 and 3 of the Regulations
      for Enforcement of the Company Law, as well as the status of the system
      (Internal Control System) that has been developed based on such
      resolutions.</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">With
      respect to subsidiaries, we communicated with and exchanged information
      with Directors and Corporate Auditors of the subsidiaries and received
      business reports from subsidiaries as deemed necessary.</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Based
      on the above methods, we reviewed the business report for the fiscal year
      and its supporting schedules.</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">In
      addition, we monitored and reviewed whether the Independent Auditors
      maintained their independent positions and conducted the audit properly,
      received reports from the Independent Auditors on the performance of their
      duties, and requested further explanations as deemed
      necessary.&#160;&#160;Furthermore, we were informed by the Independent
      Auditor that they are establishing a &#8220;System to ensure the appropriate
      performance of duties&#8221; (<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Syokumu no Suikou ga Tekisetsu
      ni Okonawareru Koto o Kakuho Suru Tameno Taisei</font>) (Matters as
      defined in each Section of Article 131 of the Company Accounting
      Regulations) pursuant to &#8220;Quality control standards of audit&#8221; (<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Kansa ni Kansuru Hinshitsu
      Kanri Kijyun</font>)&#160;&#160;(the Business Accounting Counsel, October
      28, 2005), and requested their explanations as deemed
      necessary.</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Based
      on the above methods, we reviewed the financial statements (the balance
      sheets, statements of income, statements of changes in stockholders&#8217;
      equity, notes to non-consolidated financial statements) as well as its
      supporting schedules and the consolidated financial statements for the
      67th fiscal year (the consolidated balance sheets, consolidated statements
      of income, consolidated statements of stockholders&#8217; equity, and notes to
      consolidated financial statements).</font></div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">36</font></div>
      </div>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    </div>
    <div>
      <div align="left">
        <div align="left">
          <table cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
              <tr>
                <td align="left" colspan="4" valign="top" width="100%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 1px solid; BORDER-TOP: black 1px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: black 1px solid">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
      Results of Audit</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(1)&#160;&#160;
      Results of audit of the business report and other documents</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;The
      business report and its supporting schedules of the Company accurately
      present the financial conditions of the Company in conformity with
      applicable laws and regulations and the Articles of Incorporation of the
      Company.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(ii)&#160;&#160;No
      irregularity or violation of applicable laws or regulations or the
      Articles of Incorporation of the Company was found with respect to the
      activities of the Directors.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 54pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(iii)&#160;The
      contents of the resolutions of the meeting of the Board of Directors with
      respect to the internal control system are appropriate.&#160;&#160;In
      addition, there are no matters to be pointed out regarding the performance
      of duties of Directors with respect to the internal control
      system.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(2)&#160;&#160;
      Results of audit of the financial statements and its supporting
      schedules.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.55pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      methods and results of audit performed by Ernst &amp; Young ShinNihon LLC,
      the independent auditor of the Company, are appropriate.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">(3)&#160;&#160;
      Results of audit of the consolidated financial statements</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.55pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.55pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">The
      methods and results of audit performed by Ernst &amp; Young ShinNihon LLC,
      the independent auditor of the Company, are appropriate.</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">May
      20, 2009</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td align="left" colspan="4" valign="top" width="100%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 1px solid; PADDING-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: black 1px solid">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 315pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Board
      of Corporate Auditors of Advantest Corporation</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 216pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 19.45pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 1px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="20%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Hitoshi
      Owada</font></font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Standing
      Corporate Auditor</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td align="left" valign="top" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px">
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 27.35pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 24pt; FONT-FAMILY: century gothic">O</font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                </td>
                <td valign="top" width="22%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: black 1px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;
      </font></td>
              </tr>

                <td valign="top" width="50%" style="BORDER-LEFT: black 1px solid; BORDER-BOTTOM: 4px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;

      Morita</font></font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Standing

                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>

                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Megumi
      Yamamuro</font></font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Outside

      Haneda</font></font></div>
                  <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Outside

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Memorandum to
Shareholders</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Fiscal Year</font>: Starting from
April 1 of each year and ending on March 31 of the following year</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Ordinary general meeting of
shareholders</font>: June of each year</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Date
of Decision on shareholders of record qualified to receive
dividends:</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">March 31
of each year and September 30 when interim dividends are paid.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Method
for public notice:</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Public
notice will be posted on the Company&#8217;s website
(http://www.advantest.co.jp/investors/).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">However,
in the case of accidents or other inevitable circumstances that prevent the
Company from posting public notices on such Company&#8217;s website, public notices
are carried in the Nihon Keizai Shimbun.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Share registration agent</font>: Main
Office, Tokyo Securities Transfer Agent Co., Ltd.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Place
for share transfer/registration business:</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Nihon
Bld. 4F, 6-2 Otemachi 2-chome, Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(Reference)
Toll free number: 0120-49-7009</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">*In
taking the necessary procedure by mail, please send to the following
address.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(Mail)
8-4, Izumi 2-chome, Suginami-ku, Tokyo, 168-8522</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Business
Center, Tokyo Securities Transfer Agent Co., Ltd.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Share
transfer / registration services are available at the Main Office and Branch
Offices in Japan of The Chuo Mitsui Trust and Banking Company,
Limited.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Number of shares comprising one unit:
</font>100 shares</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(Notice</font>)</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Please
inform the securities firm at which you hold an account of changes of address,
demands for sales and purchases of fractional shares or your preferred method of
receiving dividends.&#160;&#160;However, for various services in connection with
those shares that are recorded in the special account, please contact Tokyo
Securities Transfer Agent Co., Ltd., the firm responsible for administering such
special account.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Please
contact Tokyo Securities Transfer Agent Co., Ltd., the share registration agent,
for enquires with respect to the payment of unpaid dividends.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Notice
of Payment of Dividends and Other Benefits in respect of Listed
Stock</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In
accordance with revisions to the Special Taxation Measures Law (<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">sozei tokubetsu sochi-hou</font>),
the Company is required to send shareholders a &#8220;Notice of Payment&#8221; specifying
the amount of dividend, the amount of withholding tax and other relevant details
in connection with all dividends paid during or after January 2009.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
Company will send those shareholders who receive dividends by cashing a
&#8220;Dividend Receipt&#8221; (<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">haitoukin
ryoushusho</font>) a &#8220;Notice of Payment&#8221; pertaining to dividends paid during
2009 at the end of 2009 or the beginning of 2010.&#160;&#160;For those
shareholders who have directed the Company to pay dividends by bank transfer,
the &#8220;Dividend Statement&#8221; (<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">haitoukin keisansho</font>) that you
receive from the Company shall serve as the &#8220;Notice of Payment&#8221;.&#160;&#160;The
&#8220;Notice of Payment&#8221; may be used as an attachment when filing your income tax
return.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Notice
concerning Characters in the Addresses and/or Names of Shareholders</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In
accordance with the transition to the paperless stock system, if <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">kanji </font>or other characters
that are not recognized in the system used by Japan Securities Depository
Center, Inc. (&#8220;JASDEC&#8221;) are included in a shareholder&#8217;s address or name, all or
part of such address or name shall either be converted into a character
recognized by the JASDEC system or <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">kana</font> characters and recorded
on the shareholder&#8217;s register as such.&#160;&#160;Accordingly, notices sent to
shareholders of the Company may be addressed to the name and/or address of such
shareholders as converted to the JASDEC system.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">38</font>&#160;</font>

      <div>
        <hr style="COLOR: black" align="left" noshade size="2" width="100%">
